Target creature can't block this turn, then if Liberation of Colony 4 wasn't cast from your hand draw a card.
As long as you are stagnant Liberation of Colony 4 has flashback {1}{R}. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn. You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
